name: Macdonald Manchester Hotel & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel due to it being so close to train station, and was only staying one night (8th Nov) to go to a concert. We very delighted with our choice, the staff were very attentive, there was a large event going on, but the front desk still managed to get us a taxi swiftly... The barman was very helpfull, sorting our drinks out, even though my room card wasn't scanned correctly, unusual to find any level of trust these days... The room was large and had a great view of the city, the bathroom was first class. The only thing that looked odd was that the TV looked small, because of the size of the room.. Breakfast was not cheap, but that is ok so long as it is of a very high standard, which it was...
reviews.title: Large room with great view..

description: The 4-star Macdonald Manchester hotel sits in the heart of Manchester, within walking distance of Piccadilly train station and close to major motorways. Setting a new standard in luxury accommodation, our landmark hotel blends sophisticated meeting and conference facilities with delicious food and drink, stylish bedrooms, a fitness suite and spa. The Macdonald standard of personal service and hospitality completes the package, making the Manchester hotel a clear leader for business and leisure.
